Windlord::

Windlord hought that the femme was bot's love and he gave time to 
him to express his feelings. After a while he said politely "Excuse 
me... we follow your signal and we deduce that you're a maximnal... 
one of us... I'm here to lead you to our base... In case that you 
like it"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Templar said nothing. He was alive and well, at least physically. 
He 
> grabbed the rim of the pod's hatch with one hand and pulled 
himself 
> free. In the other hand, though, he carried something... no, it 
was 
> someone, or rather had been.
> 
> Templar got out, carrying in his arms the shell of Umbral, a 
slender 
> woman-bot, locked in pain through death. A massive blasthole was 
> centered on her chest, surrounded by smaller blaster shots on the 
> rest of her body.
> 
> The bodyguard laid her down wordlessly and started piling leaves 
on 
> her. After she was covered, he kneeled and started crying 
quietly...
> 
> Templar: Let this be your final resting place, dear Umbral...
>
